info.name: Grilled Lamb Burger Combo
info.description: Save 14% with this combo of grilled lamb burger combo, our signature grilled lamb burger patty topped with crunchy lettuce, cheese, and onions served with garlic mayo on a toasted burger bun served with 2pc of peri peri chicken wings, along with fries & 250 ml beverage.

info.name: Jumbo Royal Burger Combo
info.description: Save 17% with this combo of jumbo royal chicken burger + 2 pcs hot & spicy chicken wings with fries & 250 ml beverage

info.name: Chicken Fillet Burger Combo
info.description: Ssave 22% with this combo of chicken fillet burger + 2 pcs h&s wings with fries & 250 ml beverage.

info.name: Grilled Peri Peri Chicken Burger Combo
info.description: Save 12% with this combo, our peri peri chicken burger fresh grilled peri peri chicken fillet, crunchy lettuce, cheese, onions, sliced tomatoes, and signature sauce on a toasted burger bun served with 2pc of peri peri chicken wings, fries & 250 ml beverage.

info.name: Peri Peri Paneer Burger Combo
info.description: Save 27% with this combo of peri-peri paneer burger + 8 pcs potato pops with fries & 250 ml beverage.

info.name: Veggie Supreme Burger Combo
info.description: Save 23% with this combo of veggie supreme burger+ 8 pcs potato pops with fries & 250 ml beverage.
